questions.quote: Yes George, I did. Come in, come in. George, the wordaround the office is that you're a Communist.
Well, I guess it started about twenty years ago when I got back from Viet Nam, and this was the only friend I had left.

But Iiii never heard her Cries for Help.  An' nowww.. Susie is gone.
Well, actually, it's kind of a funny story because she has this amazing toy collection and last night I finally got to play with them.
Oh, well, I'm staying out of this one. This is between them. I am not getting involved.
Good thinking, Kruger. Until you pin me, George, Festivus is not over!
What are you doing out there?! You're holding up the production of the movie! We can't shoot and Woody, he's really mad at you.

No, no, no. He knows how to talk to these people. No-one's gonna take advantage of Georgie.
